title: MacBook Air A2179 with Internet Recovery failure
message:
This 2020 MacBook Air (820-01958) shows no signs of damage other than a bad battery, which I replaced. It loads Internet Recovery very slowly and, after 20 minutes, always ends with error -2003F. It fails to enter DFU mode (both keyboard method and using FORCE_DFU pins). So I removed and reflashed the SoC ROM chip (U4770), which allowed me to do a successful DFU Restore. 

However, it still won't load Internet Recovery. It does load Apple Hardware Test which ends with "no issues found". 

Anything recommended to try before I give up on this board?

message:
With "new" chinese?
That is not known good!

title: MacBook Air A2179 with Internet Recovery failure
message: No, an original battery pulled from another A2179 topcase.
